title: Lap Trinh Vien Java Backend
description: Chung toi dang tim kiem lap trinh vien Java Backend co kinh nghiem toi thieu 2 nam lam viec voi Spring Boot, RESTful API va MySQL. Ung vien can co kha nang lam viec doc lap va co tinh than trach nhiem cao.
requirements: Yeu cau kinh nghiem voi Java Spring Boot toi thieu 2 nam. Thanh thao MySQL va RESTful API. Biet Docker la mot loi the lon. Co tinh than hoc hoi va lam viec nhom tot.
